checks.name: orders_raw count
checks.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hive.procurement.orders_raw WHERE date = '2025-12-02'

checks.name: stock_raw count
checks.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hive.procurement.stock_raw WHERE date = '2025-12-02'

checks.name: product_supplier count
checks.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM postgresql.public.product_supplier WHERE is_primary = true
